snippet.title: Courier-Mail in hunt for major award
snippet.content: THE Courier-Mail and The Sunday Mail are up for major awards at one of the newspaper industry's most prized nights. The Courier-Mail has been announced as a finalist in the National/Metropolitan Daily Newspaper of the Year, while The Sunday Mail is up for Weekend Newspaper of the Year at the annual Pacific Area Newspaper Publishers Association (PANPA) awards. Website couriermail.com.au has also been short-listed as a National/Metropolitan News Site of the Year. Photographer Annette Dew is a finalist in the National/Metropolitan Sport Photography category for her stunning portrait of Titans NRL star Daniel "The Vidotron" Vidot. Winners of the prestigious awards will be announced at a ceremony held in Sydney on September 6.

sindex.name: National/Metropolitan Daily Newspaper of the Year
